name: Goya
description:
This game was made for the Boss Rush Jam 2023 by Axel, Maider and Marc. It is a tribute to the spanish artist Goya and its Black Paintings (Las Pinturas Negras).

Keyboard: Arrows to move. Space to jump. Left control for action.
Gamepad (XBOX): Left stick to move. A to jump. X for action.
Gamepad (PS4/5): Left stick to move. X to jump. Square for action.

Licenses are specified in a folder of the game files.

We use the "Makeshift" theme in two ways. Our artist (Maider) used the first thing that was available to draw the art, and then digitalized it. Also, we force the player to use whatever is in each scenario to win against the bosses, as they can not be damaged by traditional means.
